title: Medical Communication Education Design Based on Operating Room Simulation Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Simulation-based learning environment for medical device company managers/leaders to acquire effective communication skills in operating room settings

learning_goals: Perform communication protocols for each major step in surgical simulation environments with 90% accuracy
Achieve 4 points or higher (out of 5) in 360-degree feedback evaluations regarding understanding of role distribution and safety protocols within surgical teams
The procedure summary written after the operating room simulation shows an accuracy improvement of over 70% compared to the pre-assessment
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
